comment.author: 93183605@N07
comment._content: Inscription on the photo appears to say Bledisloe, which fits with the content of the album/series - lots of government buildings, etc. Lord Bledisloe was Governor-General of New Zealand 1930–35. Hard to see but that looks like him in the front left. There is another portrait of him here: www.nzhistory.net.nz/media/photo/lord-bledisloe-empire-day Possibly Lady Bledisloe next to him?
